editor.label: Application Server - IIS6 CreateWebSite
editor.description: This procedure creates a web site configuration on a local or remote computer.

formElement.label: Configuration name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute physical path assigned to the web site you want to create.

formElement.label: Absolute path of the script utility:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute path of the script utility used to execute this step (i.e: iisweb or c:/windows/system32/iisweb.vbs).

formElement.label: Absolute path attached to the web site:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute physical path assigned to the web site you want to create.

formElement.label: Host header name:
formElement.documentation: Specifies the host header name for the Web site, such as www.microsoft.com. By default, the site does not have a host header name assigned.

formElement.label: Web site name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the descriptive name, or the metabase path, of the web site you want to create.

formElement.label: Start web site:
formElement.documentation: Indicate if the web site must be started after creation.
